titles.title: A bill to extend veteran's benefits to persons serving in the Armed Forces between November 12, 1918, and July 2, 1921.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Defines those members who served in the armed forces between November 12, 1918, and July 2, 1921, as World War I veterans and reinstates their veteran status.
